title: 19-year-old Riverview man missing
description: Police are asking for the public's help to find Matthew Jeffrey Morton, 19, of Riverview who is missing. Police say Morton was last seen March 22 near Carney Avenue in Moncton around 1:30 a.m. He was reported missing to police on the same day.Morton is descri…
